sentences.en: a basket of goodies for the children
sentences.cn: 给孩子们的一篮好吃的东西

sentences.en: After reading the letter, he threw it in the waste - paper basket.
sentences.cn: 他看完信之后, 把它扔进了字纸篓.

sentences.en: He saw the dog's twitching nose poke out of the basket.
sentences.cn: 他看到那只狗一抽一抽的鼻子从篮子里冒出来。

sentences.en: He sent a basket of exotic fruit and a card.
sentences.cn: 他送了一篮子异域水果和一张卡片。

sentences.en: He'd put his dirty laundry in the clothes basket.
sentences.cn: 他会把自己的脏衣服扔进洗衣篮里。

sentences.en: I consigned her letter to the waste basket.
sentences.cn: 我把她的信丢进了废纸篓。

sentences.en: I dis-covered a mutilated cassette stuffed in a waste-basket.
sentences.cn: 我发现一盘被弄坏的盒式磁带丢在废纸篓里。

sentences.en: My basket is so full that I can't carry it.
sentences.cn: 我的篮子装得太满,我拿不动它.

sentences.en: She consigned his letter to the waste basket.
sentences.cn: 她把他的信丟进废纸篓.

sentences.en: She nestled the eggs safely in the straw in Jim's basket.
sentences.cn: 她把鸡蛋轻轻地放在吉姆篮子里的稻草上。

sentences.en: The large log basket can be used to tidy toys away.
sentences.cn: 大木篮子可以用来装玩具。

sentences.en: The north-west became the country's bread-basket.
sentences.cn: 西北地区成为该国的大粮仓。
像编篮子之类的传统工艺

sentences.en: We jam - packed the basket with all kinds of fruit.
sentences.cn: 我们用各种水果把篮子塞满.

phrases.tran_cn: 四肢不全的人；完全伤残者；完全没有希望的人
产粮区；面包篮；谷物产品

trans.tran_cn: 篮，筐，一筐的量，投篮得分
trans.tran_en: a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in
a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in
